RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Specials
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks are special, rare quirks that provide secondary abilities, benifits or chalenges. Some can be added via crafted enablers.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Munchies
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Occasionaly, [PAWN_label] will get the most uncontrolable cases of the munchies.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anxious
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Ever get that feeling that you just need to hide? [PAWN_label] gets it bad.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Greedy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As far as [PAWN_label]'s concerned, once you're prey, you're prey for good.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Submissive
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As far as [PAWN_label]'s concerned, once they're prey, they're prey for good.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Living aphrodisiac
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: There's just... something... about how... [PAWN_label]... f-feeels inss-aahh~...

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Siren
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] knows how to make getting devoured whole and alive look good- good enough to drop your guns and walk right in.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Vicious
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] knows how to pull off the "you're a slab of meat and I'm a starved wolf" look while devouring prey, an act that can demoralize the snack's nearby friends.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Regressive enzymes
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s womb produces a potent mix of stem-cell-like enzymes, allowing for the regression of age for their prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Nutrious sweat
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s skin oils are unusualy dense in nutrents, allowing them to passivly offset their predator's need for food.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hypnoguts
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: The ways [PAWN_label]'s innards grind and churn do things to their prey's minds, leaving them in a conceringly good mood.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Pulls the look
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Everyone can agree; [PAWN_label] pulls the pred look off perfectly.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Psychurner
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] can psyonicaly link with their prey, using them to boost any psyonic powers they may have.
